ground_truth_bugs.description: forEach(async...) fire-and-forget in bookings.tsx reschedule flow
forEach(async...) fire-and-forget in handleCancelBooking recurring booking deletion
getCalendarCredentials stores Promise<Calendar> without await, breaking type contract

golden_false_positives.golden_comment: Consider adding try-catch around the await to handle import failures gracefully
golden_false_positives.reasoning: The code already handles missing/invalid app lookups gracefully with null checks and log.warn. The await on appStore[key] won't throw - it returns undefined for missing keys. This is a speculative/defensive suggestion without a concrete bug.
